title: YALE University font
content:

[http://www.ivysport.com/category-category\_id/159](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417171330/http:/www.ivysport.com/category-category_id/159 "http://www.ivysport.com/category-category\_id/159")

author: hernando

comments.content: Try these at [daFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417171330/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=104) - especially Allstar is close.
